scripts.build:bison: cd bison && npm run build && cd .. && cp -R bison/dist ../docs/bison && cd .. && git add docs/bison && git commit -m "Build and deploy bison section" && git push origin master
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build && rm -rf ../docs/roadtrip && cp -R dist ../docs/roadtrip && cd bison && npm run build && cd .. && rm -rf ../docs/bison && cp -R bison/dist ../docs/bison && cd .. && git add docs/roadtrip docs/bison && git commit -m "Build and deploy roadtrip project" && git push origin master
